test.name: 8 As a user I should be able to change my water leak detector Temperture Unit

kw.name: Given : user launches and logs in to the Lumina application
When : user navigates to "Settings Option" screen from the "Water Leak Detector" screen
And : user selects "Temperature Unit" with "Celcius"
kw.msg: [FAIL - Framework Configuration] Execute Keyword : Not able to execute Step - 'user selects "Temperature Unit" with "Celcius"'. Error Occured - null

kw.name: And : user should be disabled with "Temperature Alerts"
kw.msg: [FAIL - Framework Configuration] Execute Keyword : Not able to execute Step - 'user should be disabled with "Temperature Alerts"'. Error Occured - null

kw.name: And : user should be displayed with the following Manage Alert details:
kw.msg: [FAIL - Framework Configuration] Execute Keyword : Not able to execute Step - 'user should be displayed with the following Manage Alert details:'. Error Occured - null
